name: Cascade
description:
The popular dice-puzzle game Cascade originated on the planet Cascadia, and it is on this planet where the most intense tournaments take place. Creatures from all over the galaxy travel to Cascadia in hopes of joining the ranks of the greats. Thankfully, Cascade is a friendly game in which most players support one another, and share tips. So, while not all challengers receive a trophy, they often make new friends in pursuit of one.

Cascade is a puzzle game. Players maneuver dice around a grid, trying to form numerical combinations that may then be "blasted" to progress against the current opponent. Clearing combinations that include starred dice, and / or clearing multiple sets of combinations, speeds up the progression. Opponents are defeated when the player's energy plug rises to the top of the screen. A competitive two-player mode is also offered.
